korean: 창밖을 보니 비가 억수같이 쏟아지고 있었어.
뉴스에서 침수 피해 소식을 보니까 걱정됐다.
집에 가만히 있는 게 제일 안전한 것 같다.
english: A heavy rain warning came up, so I canceled going out.
Looking outside the window, rain was pouring down heavily.
I was worried seeing news about flooding damage on TV.
It seems safest to just stay put at home.
